results.content:
Algunas cosas son muy poco claras, y a mi criterio faltan algunos conocimientos que son necesarios, como limitar los pedidos para que no se ahogue la API y permisos según nivel de usuario.
Además, el acento del profesor hace que sea un poco difícil de seguir, y no hay subtítulos en español
results.content_html:

Además, el acento del profesor hace que sea un poco difícil de seguir, y no hay subtítulos en español

results.content: The zip file doesn't have the complete project builded en ths course, but the temary about API Restful is great, thanks
results.content_html: The zip file doesn't have the complete project builded en ths course, but the temary about API Restful is great, thanks

results.content:
* Some topics are not clear.

* The pronunciation is not very good, but with the subtitles it is possible to understand.

* Lack of resources throughout the course. Like the database script and perhaps some explanatory PDFs for each chapter.

* I was confused sometimes when in one video he did something and in the next one he deleted or changed it for something new. This is a lack of consistency in content.

* I would have preferred it to focus on doing less and explaining better. For example, some tables were created in the database that contributed almost nothing to the course. Better to focus on USERS table and POST table and then explain how we could do to create a new model based on everything done with the aforementioned tables.

* The code provided is incomplete and not exist github repository.
results.content_html:
* Some topics are not clear.

* The pronunciation is not very good, but with the subtitles it is possible to understand.

* Lack of resources throughout the course. Like the database script and perhaps some explanatory PDFs for each chapter.

* I was confused sometimes when in one video he did something and in the next one he deleted or changed it for something new. This is a lack of consistency in content.

* I would have preferred it to focus on doing less and explaining better. For example, some tables were created in the database that contributed almost nothing to the course. Better to focus on USERS table and POST table and then explain how we could do to create a new model based on everything done with the aforementioned tables.

* The code provided is incomplete and not exist github repository.

results.content: Best explanation about RESt and still learned some new things from Yii2. I hope more courses made by you. Make one about Angular + Yii2. Congratulations!
